languages.text: "...уповая на великую схему откровения и соединое движение к нему". {n}Голос Паскаля вибрирует от... счастья?{/n} "Это Его слова. Я не слышал их так давно".
"...and trust in the great pattern of revelation and uniform progression toward it." {n}Pasqal's voice is trembling with... elation?{/n} "Those are his words. I have not heard them in so very long."
languages.original_text: "...уповая на великую схему откровения и соединое движение к нему". {n}Голос Паскаля вибрирует от... счастья?{/n} "Это Его слова. Я не слышал их так давно".

"...and trust in the great pattern of revelation and uniform progression toward it." {n}Pasqal's voice is trembling with... elation?{/n} "Those are his words. I have not heard them in so very long."

languages.text: "... und vertraut auf das große Muster der Offenbarung und des gleichförmigen Weges dorthin." {n}Pasqals Stimme zittert vor ... Euphorie?{/n} "Das sind seine Worte. Ich habe sie so lange nicht mehr gehört."
languages.original_text: "...and trust in the great pattern of revelation and uniform progression toward it." {n}Pasqal's voice is trembling with... elation?{/n} "Those are his words. I have not heard them in so very long."

traits.locale_text: "... und vertraut auf das große Muster der Offenbarung und des gleichförmigen Weges dorthin." {n}Pasqals Stimme zittert vor ... Euphorie?{/n} "Das sind seine Worte. Ich habe sie so lange nicht mehr gehört."

languages.text: « ... et se fient au grand projet de révélation et à la progression uniforme vers lui, » {n}poursuit Pasqal d'une voix tremblante de... joie ?{/n} « Ce sont ses mots. Je ne les avais pas entendus depuis très longtemps. »
languages.original_text: "...and trust in the great pattern of revelation and uniform progression toward it." {n}Pasqal's voice is trembling with... elation?{/n} "Those are his words. I have not heard them in so very long."

traits.locale_text: « ... et se fient au grand projet de révélation et à la progression uniforme vers lui, » {n}poursuit Pasqal d'une voix tremblante de... joie ?{/n} « Ce sont ses mots. Je ne les avais pas entendus depuis très longtemps. »

languages.text: “……相信伟大的启示，朝着启示稳步迈进。”{n}帕斯卡的声音颤抖着，充满了……喜悦吗？{/n}“这正是他的原话，我已经很久没听到过这些话了。”
languages.original_text: "...and trust in the great pattern of revelation and uniform progression toward it." {n}Pasqal's voice is trembling with... elation?{/n} "Those are his words. I have not heard them in so very long."

traits.locale_text: “……相信伟大的启示，朝着启示稳步迈进。”{n}帕斯卡的声音颤抖着，充满了……喜悦吗？{/n}“这正是他的原话，我已经很久没听到过这些话了。”

languages.text: 「…天啓の偉大なるパターンに対する信頼と、それに向かう統一された進歩」{n}パスカルの声は震えている…高揚しているのだろうか？{/n}「彼の言葉だ。長い間、聞くこともありませんでしたが」
languages.original_text: "...and trust in the great pattern of revelation and uniform progression toward it." {n}Pasqal's voice is trembling with... elation?{/n} "Those are his words. I have not heard them in so very long."

traits.locale_text: 「…天啓の偉大なるパターンに対する信頼と、それに向かう統一された進歩」{n}パスカルの声は震えている…高揚しているのだろうか？{/n}「彼の言葉だ。長い間、聞くこともなかったが」

languages.text: «... y confiar en el gran patrón de la revelación y la progresión uniforme hacia ella». {n}La voz de Pasqal tiembla de... ¿júbilo?{/n} «Esas son sus palabras. Llevaba mucho tiempo sin oírlas».
languages.original_text: "...and trust in the great pattern of revelation and uniform progression toward it." {n}Pasqal's voice is trembling with... elation?{/n} "Those are his words. I have not heard them in so very long."

traits.locale_text: «... y confiar en el gran patrón de la revelación y la progresión uniforme hacia ella». {n}La voz de Pasqal tiembla de... ¿júbilo?{/n} «Esas son sus palabras. Llevaba mucho tiempo sin oírlas».

languages.text: "İtikat edip ona doğru tek yürek ilerlemesi için bir plan tertiplendi." {n}Pasqal'ın sesi... Coşkuyla mı titriyor?{/n} "Bunlar, onun sözleri. Duymayalı o kadar uzun zaman oldu ki."
languages.original_text: "...and trust in the great pattern of revelation and uniform progression toward it." {n}Pasqal's voice is trembling with... elation?{/n} "Those are his words. I have not heard them in so very long."

traits.locale_text: "...aydınlanmanın mucizevi örüntüsü ile bu uğurdaki muntazam ilerlemeye inanmaları için yaratıldı." {n}Pasqal'ın sesi... Coşkuyla mı titriyor?{/n} "Bunlar, onun sözleri. Duymayalı o kadar uzun zaman oldu ki..."
